active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the security trade-offs of using containerization for corporate data versus traditional VM-based isolation. Consider factors like resource efficiency, shared kernel risks, and compliance requirements from NIST SP 800-190. Support arguments with real-world examples from breaches like the 2021 Codecov supply chain attack.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

Key risks to corporate data: supply chain (images), privilege escalation (runtime), orchestration misconfigs. Core Concepts: Container image (static template), runtime (Docker/containerd), orchestration (Kubernetes), attack surface (build/ship/run phases).
